note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cobenian Blog
body:
### Welcome
You'll find all sorts of technical information on software development related to DNS, routing, devops and more here. Don't get too attached to any programming language either, we'll cover Java, Clojure, Node.js, Go, Python, Ruby, and probably quite a few more as time goes by.

### Lame DNS testing
Be sure to check out [lame.cobenian.com](http://lame.cobenian.com). This is currently under active development.

### Secure route origination
Be sure to check out [www.cobenian.com/documentation/rpki.html](http://www.cobenian.com/documentation/rpki.html) and [rpki.cobenian.com](http://rpki.cobenian.com). This is a bare bones application that was developed in under 24 hours. More features will be added over time.

### Our home
And of course, don't forget about [www.cobenian.com](http://www.cobenian.com).
